lines.name: The Queen's Hunger

explicitModifiers.text:
Trigger Level 20 Bone Offering, Flesh Offering or Spirit Offering every 5 seconds
Offering Skills Triggered this way also affect you
32% of Damage is taken from Mana before Life while Focussed
+3973 to Armour during Soul Gain Prevention
32% of Damage is taken from Mana before Life while Focused
1.5% of Evasion Rating is Regenerated as Life per second while Focused
120% increased Effect of Fortify on you while Focussed
Recover (38-40)% of Mana and Energy Shield when you Focus
120% increased Effect of Fortify on you while Focused
Regenerate 200 Energy Shield per second while a Rare or Unique Enemy is Nearby

lines.flavourText:
In their crimson nightmare, the Vaal are still sacrificing themselves to her glory and beauty. 
They stab their own hearts and cry out in ecstasy, only to rise again.

lines.name: Drillneck

explicitModifiers.text: (10-14) to (19-24) Added Physical Damage with Bow Attacks
Arrows deal 50% increased Damage with Hits and Ailments to Targets they Pierce

lines.flavourText:
"Why waste such a fine arrow on just one man?" 
- Kiravi, Vaal Archer

lines.name: Deshret's Vise
lines.flavourText:
Ride with pride,
strike with vengeance,
live with honour.

lines.name: Hellbringer

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Elemental Gems
(125-149)% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells
Gain (15-19) Energy Shield per Enemy Killed

lines.flavourText: Absolute corruption empowers absolutely.

lines.name: Talisman of the Victor
lines.flavourText:
A glimpse of victory
is all you need to win.

lines.name: Titucus Span

explicitModifiers.text: -10 Physical Damage taken from Projectile Attacks
+25% Chance to Block Projectile Attack Damage

lines.flavourText:
A mighty bulwark, curved and strong
A dauntless wall, against the throng
All lance and arrow, knocked aside
For rout of foe, for turn of tide.

lines.name: The Flow Untethered

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Summon Harbinger of Time Skill

lines.name: Varunastra

explicitModifiers.text: +(2-3) Mana gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
Gain (2-3) Mana per Enemy Hit with Attacks
Counts as all One Handed Melee Weapon Types

lines.flavourText:
"Painful suicide in the hands of a fool, 
Creative death in the hands of a master."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 2992

lines.name: Kintsugi

explicitModifiers.text: 20% less Damage taken if you have not been Hit Recently
50% increased Evasion Rating if you have been Hit Recently

lines.flavourText:
Do not hide your flaws, your cracks,
mend them, and display them proudly.
For it is these that set us apart.

lines.name: Demigod's Bounty
lines.flavourText:
The bindings of the victorious
wrap around the throats of the defeated.

lines.name: Demigod's Authority

explicitModifiers.text: You and Nearby Allies have 30% increased Item Rarity

lines.flavourText: Flashback #4 Raider

lines.name: The Fracturing Spinner

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Summon Harbinger of Directions Skill
Adds (19-22) to (30-35) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
Adds (19-22) to (30-35) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks

<<HBGAa>><<HBG01>><<HBGAc>><<HBG01>><<HBGAo>>

lines.name: Hinekora's Sight
lines.flavourText: Remember the past, anticipate the future.

lines.name: Fenumus' Shroud

explicitModifiers.text: Enemies affected by your Spider's Webs deal 10% reduced Damage
Enemies affected by your Spider's Webs have -10% to All Resistances
(51-70)% increased Aspect of the Spider Area of Effect

lines.flavourText:
The First of the Night was the first explorer
It was she who first braved night's terrors
and found comfort in silence and solace.

lines.name: Facebreaker

explicitModifiers.text: (627-975)% more Physical Damage with Unarmed Attacks
(715-989)% more Physical Damage with Unarmed Melee Attacks

lines.flavourText: Fly like a Storm Crow, crush like a Rhoa

lines.name: Headhunter

explicitModifiers.text: (20-30)% increased Damage with Hits against Rare monsters
When you Kill a Rare monster, you gain its Modifiers for (20-60) seconds

lines.flavourText:
"A man's soul rules from a cavern of bone, learns and
judges through flesh-born windows. The heart is meat.
The head is where the Man is."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

lines.name: Aegis Aurora

explicitModifiers.text: Recover Energy Shield equal to 4% of Armour when you Block
Replenishes Energy Shield by (2-4)% of Armour when you Block
(10-20)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText:
Born from the marriage of ice and sky,
the aurora evokes both awe and power.

lines.name: The Goddess Unleashed

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (66-99)% of Sword Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage
Gain Her Blessing for 3 seconds when you Ignite an Enemy
33% chance to Blind nearby Enemies when gaining Her Blessing
Cannot be Frozen, Chilled or Ignited with Her Blessing
100% chance to Avoid being Ignited, Chilled or Frozen with Her Blessing
20% increased Attack and Movement Speed with Her Blessing

lines.flavourText:
As a maiden I was bound; as a crone was I scorned
Promised power rarely found, delivered fury fairly thorned.
Not enough?...Fine. Now I am become both and another
To take your hand and cradle your talents, not smother
The consummate flames. So hush, dear, say not a word. 
Bequeathed, betrayed...beloved. At last, I am the third.

lines.name: Silverbough

explicitModifiers.text: +(1-2) to Level of Socketed Bow Gems

lines.flavourText: The lone tree grows thickest.

lines.name: Demigod's Touch
lines.flavourText:
Though the battle has been long,
Victory is at hand.

lines.name: Ngamahu's Sign

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (8-10) to (12-14) Fire Damage to Spells and Attacks
Recover (20-30) Life when you Ignite an Enemy

lines.flavourText:
A gift from Ngamahu,
a sign to the Karui to spread like fire.
Given to Akoya, but inherited by Kaom with the swing of his axe.

lines.name: Craiceann's Carapace

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 20 Aspect of the Crab Skill
Bleeding cannot be inflicted on you
+5 to Maximum number of Crab Barriers

lines.flavourText:
The First of the Deep was the First of All.
It was He who conquered the waves,
who stood guard as land rose from sea.

lines.name: Story of the Vaal

explicitModifiers.text: 50% of Physical Damage from Hits with this Weapon is Converted to a random Element
Hits with this Weapon always Ignite, Freeze, and Shock

lines.flavourText:
Through war we found peace. Through death we found advancement.
Our ancestors did not know where their actions would take them.
Are we any better?

<default>{This item can be transformed on the Altar of Sacrifice along with Vial of Fate}

lines.name: Farrul's Fur

explicitModifiers.text: Aspect of the Cat has no Reservation
Aspect of the Cat Reserves no Mana
Gain up to your maximum number of Frenzy and Power Charges when you gain Cat's Stealth
You have Phasing while you have Cat's Stealth

lines.flavourText:
The First of the Plains was the First of the Hunt
It was she who showed us that there is honour
in waiting in the shadows and picking your moment.

lines.name: United in Dream

explicitModifiers.text: Minions have 60% chance to Poison Enemies on Hit
Minions Leech 5% of Damage as Life against Poisoned Enemies

lines.flavourText:
They grow fat and ripe in slumber.
To be fed upon when he wakes.

lines.name: Hateforge

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 30 Rage
Vaal Attack Skills Cost Rage instead of requiring Souls to Use
Vaal Attack Skills you Use yourself Cost Rage instead of requiring Souls
Vaal Attack Skills not Used by Totems Cost Rage instead of requiring Souls
You cannot gain Rage during Soul Gain Prevention

lines.flavourText:
The first Karui born on the fringes of the Vaal empire
developed a blood fever born of corruption.

lines.name: Grip of the Council

explicitModifiers.text: Minions gain 20% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage

lines.flavourText:
Death does not remove you from our grasp.
Death only brings you closer.

lines.name: Xoph's Inception

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-30) Life gained on Killing Ignited Enemies
Gain (22-30) Life per Ignited Enemy Killed
Gain 20% of Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage

lines.flavourText:
Upon the red pyre we are born.

<default>{This item can be transformed with a Blessing of Xoph}

lines.name: Hand of Wisdom and Action

implicitModifiers.text: +46 Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks
Gain 46 Life per Enemy Hit by Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 10 Lightning Damage to Attacks with this Weapon per 10 Intelligence
(25-30)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText:
She thinks and we act.
She acts and we think.
Fragments of the whole that washes clean the skies.

lines.name: Saqawal's Nest

explicitModifiers.text: (12-20)% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills
100% increased Aspect of the Avian Buff Effect
Aspect of the Avian also grants Avian's Might and Avian's Flight to nearby Allies
+(120-150) to Evasion Rating and Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
The First of the Sky was the Last of the First.
It was he who showed us that our limits are self-imposed,
that what we take for law may just be an illusion.

lines.name: Lightpoacher
lines.flavourText:
The eyes of the living hold a glimmer of hope.
Don't waste it.

lines.name: Demigod's Triumph
lines.flavourText:
The second trial brought most to their knees.
But not you.

lines.name: Lightning Coil

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to (20-30) Lightning Damage to Attacks
(30-50)% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Lightning Damage

lines.flavourText:
"There's nothing like imminent death
to galvanize one's purpose in life."
- Malachai the Soulless.

lines.name: Mageblood

explicitModifiers.text: Magic Utility Flasks cannot be Used
Leftmost (2-4) Magic Utility Flasks constantly apply their Flask Effects to you
Magic Utility Flask Effects cannot be removed

lines.flavourText: Rivers of power course through your veins.

lines.name: Craiceann's Chitin

explicitModifiers.text: Cannot lose Crab Barriers if you have lost Crab Barriers Recently
+(3-5)% Chance to Block Attack Damage while you have at least (5-10) Crab Barriers

lines.flavourText:
When the rains come, we cower beneath shelter.
The First of the Deep teaches us
that we should seek no shelter but ourselves.

lines.name: The Rippling Thoughts

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Summon Harbinger of the Arcane Skill
Trigger Level 20 Storm Cascade when you Attack
Adds 1 to (60-70) Lightning Damage to Spells

lines.flavourText:

lines.name: Steppan Eard

explicitModifiers.text: 20% increased Movement Speed on Shocked Ground
Regenerate 2% of Life per second on Chilled Ground

lines.flavourText:
To fight an enemy on their lands is a tactical mistake. 
Make those lands your own, and the mistake becomes theirs.

lines.name: Starforge

explicitModifiers.text: 20% increased Area of Effect for Attacks

lines.flavourText: The end is written into the beginning.

lines.name: Crystal Vault

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 20% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Cold Damage
30% of Fire Damage from Hits taken as Cold Damage

lines.flavourText:
Beneath the frozen eye of Lunaris
a new world will be born.
A crystalline, perfectly still utopia.

lines.name: Kintsugi

explicitModifiers.text: 20% less Damage taken if you have not been Hit Recently
50% increased Evasion Rating if you have been Hit Recently

lines.flavourText:
Do not hide your flaws, your cracks,
mend them, and display them proudly.
For it is these that set us apart.

lines.name: Kalandra's Touch
lines.flavourText:
On one hand, you have a choice.
On the other, you have its twin.

lines.name: Demigod's Eye
lines.flavourText:
The victor stands tall with hand held high,
unwavering, unblinking, unstoppable.

lines.name: Soul Strike

implicitModifiers.text: 27% increased Critical Strike Chance with Bows

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (13-18) to (26-32) Chaos Damage to Attacks
(80-150)% faster start of Energy Shield Recharge

lines.flavourText:
In this chaotic world
The rewards of the Soul
Outlast the rewards of the Flesh.

lines.name: Mutewind Pennant

explicitModifiers.text: Gain Onslaught for 4 seconds when you Warcry

lines.flavourText: Embrace the snow or be buried.

lines.name: Faminebind

explicitModifiers.text: Deals 50 Chaos Damage per second to nearby Enemies

lines.flavourText:
After the Great Fire, the land lay barren
and our forefathers grew weak.
Mother Gull took pity on them
and gave them grain and water.

lines.name: Redblade Banner

explicitModifiers.text: 2% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life against Taunted Enemies

lines.flavourText: Blood shed is blood shared.

lines.name: Original Sin

explicitModifiers.text: All Elemental Damage Converted to Chaos Damage

lines.flavourText:
Innocence rose to godhood not on inspired faith,
but on the vilification and hatred of another.

lines.name: Replica Forbidden Shako

lines.flavourText:
"I believed I understood Prototype #112 quite fully, until a test subject
with Azmeri ancestry donned it. I will be haunted by the results
for the rest of my life."  - Researcher Graven

lines.name: Reach of the Council
lines.flavourText: We stand together. We strike together.

lines.name: Stasis Prison

explicitModifiers.text: (80-100)% of Damage taken Recouped as Life

lines.flavourText: Those that can never die have but one wish.

lines.name: Springleaf

explicitModifiers.text: Regenerate (3-6)% of Life per second while on Low Life

lines.flavourText: From death springs life.

lines.name: Trypanon

explicitModifiers.text: This Weapon's Critical Strike Chance is 100%
All Attacks with this Weapon are Critical Strikes

lines.flavourText:
"Though ingenious instruments have been found,
it seems surgery before thaumaturgy
was not so delicate."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 3546

lines.name: Uul-Netol's Embrace

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Bone Nova when you Kill a Bleeding Enemy
Trigger Level 20 Bone Nova when you Hit a Bleeding Enemy
Attacks have 25% chance to inflict Bleeding when Hitting Cursed Enemies

lines.flavourText:
At last she holds us,
and so we turn to dust.

lines.name: Stasis Prison

explicitModifiers.text: (80-100)% of Damage taken Recouped as Life

lines.flavourText: Those that can never die have but one wish.

lines.name: Mark of the Elder

implicitModifiers.text: Adds (3-4) to (10-16) Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: 20% chance to Trigger Level 20 Tentacle Whip on Kill
Adds (26-38) to (42-57) Cold Damage to Attacks
(60-93)% increased Attack Damage if your other Ring is a Shaper Item
Cannot be Stunned by Attacks if your other Ring is an Elder Item

lines.flavourText: Be not stirred by the Void.

lines.name: Starforge

explicitModifiers.text: 20% increased Area of Effect for Attacks

lines.flavourText: The end is written into the beginning.

lines.name: Defiance of Destiny

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (25-42)% of Missing Unreserved Life before being Hit by an Enemy

lines.flavourText:
The farmer was struck again and again, but he refused to stay down.
Astonished, the raiding warlord ordered the man's family spared.

lines.name: Demigod's Dominance
lines.flavourText:
The victorious know only leadership,
the rest only servitude.

lines.name: Brutus' Lead Sprinkler

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 4 to 7 Fire Damage to Attacks with this Weapon per 10 Strength

lines.flavourText:
"A sprinkle of liquid encouragement is often required 
to garnish the perfect confession." 
- Brutus, Warden of Axiom

lines.name: Ashes of the Stars

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of all Skill Gems
+(20-30)% to Quality of all Skill Gems

lines.flavourText:
A single facet contains the wisdom
of countless disintegrated worlds.

lines.name: The Surrender
lines.flavourText:
Our hearts cry out
but are silenced by our flesh
and so we give up our flesh.

lines.name: Voll's Devotion

explicitModifiers.text: Gain an Endurance Charge when you lose a Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
"We are the soldiers of Faith, armoured in devotion.
Let the sinners come, for we - the Pure - shall endure!"
- Voll of Thebrus, at the Battle of the Bridge

lines.name: The Tempest's Binding

The eldritch storm descended upon us, and bruised lightning

25% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit

lines.flavourText:
"I do not believe in disguising my disappointment."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: The Queen's Hunger

explicitModifiers.text:
Trigger Level 20 Bone Offering, Flesh Offering or Spirit Offering every 5 seconds
Offering Skills Triggered this way also affect you
+3798 to Armour during Soul Gain Prevention
Regenerate 200 Energy Shield per second while a Rare or Unique Enemy is Nearby
11% chance to Avoid Elemental Damage from Hits during Soul Gain Prevention

lines.flavourText:
In their crimson nightmare, the Vaal are still sacrificing themselves to her glory and beauty. 
They stab their own hearts and cry out in ecstasy, only to rise again.

lines.name: Yaomac's Accord

explicitModifiers.text: Gain an Endurance Charge, Frenzy Charge, and Power Charge when you use a Vaal Skill

lines.flavourText: Their three serpentine heads found unity in balance.

lines.name: Faithguard

explicitModifiers.text: Increases and Reductions to Maximum Energy Shield instead apply to Ward

lines.flavourText: The priests of the Kalguur worshipped knowledge, not gods.

lines.name: Olroth's Charge

explicitModifiers.text: Gain Adrenaline for 3 seconds when Ward Breaks

lines.flavourText:
Where others would retreat when vulnerable,
Olroth the Gallant fought deeper into battle.

lines.name: Soul Ascension

explicitModifiers.text: Eat a Soul when you Hit a Unique Enemy, no more than once every second
Lose an Eaten Soul every 3 seconds while no Unique Enemy is in your Presence

lines.flavourText: Fear can be instilled by the smallest entity.

lines.name: Briskwrap
lines.flavourText:
"I carry neither food nor drink. I rely on the charity
of my fellow wayfarers. Dead men are generous men."
- Taruk of the Wildmen

lines.name: Legacy of Fury

explicitModifiers.text:
(30-40)% chance when you Kill a Scorched Enemy to Burn Each surrounding
Enemy for 4 seconds, dealing 8% of the Killed Enemy's Life as Fire Damage per second

lines.flavourText:
All that was loved, all that was hated -
naught remains but ash.

lines.name: Skin of the Lords

explicitModifiers.text: You can only Socket Corrupted Gems in this item

lines.flavourText:
The Lords are chosen so carefully.
Only they may grace His flesh.

lines.name: Viridi's Veil

explicitModifiers.text: Damage of Enemies Hitting you is Unlucky while you have a Magic Ring Equipped
You are Hexproof if you have a Magic Ring in right slot
Take no Extra Damage from Critical Strikes if you have a Magic Ring in left slot

lines.flavourText:
"Her sisters eternally fought for that shining apex in the skies,
but Viridi instead found strength in humility."
- Azmerian Creation Myth

lines.name: Crown of the Inward Eye

explicitModifiers.text: (9-21)% increased maximum Life, Mana and Global Energy Shield

lines.flavourText: Divinity is not the only path to enlightenment.

lines.name: Graven's Secret

explicitModifiers.text: Modifiers to Minimum Power Charges instead apply to Minimum Absorption Charges
Maximum Absorption Charges is equal to Maximum Power Charges
Gain Absorption Charges instead of Power Charges

lines.flavourText: The cowardly thinker's greatest success is simply surviving.

lines.name: Voidwalker

explicitModifiers.text: 20% chance to Avoid Projectiles while Phasing
You have Phasing if you've Killed Recently
Projectiles Pierce 5 additional Targets while you have Phasing

lines.flavourText:
Step into the void
and experience true freedom.

lines.name: Inextricable Fate

explicitModifiers.text: You gain 3 Grasping Vines when you take a Critical Strike
Nearby stationary Enemies gain a Grasping Vine every 0.5 seconds
All Damage inflicts Poison against Enemies affected by at least 3 Grasping Vines
You take (30-50)% reduced Extra Damage from Critical Strikes by Poisoned Enemies

lines.flavourText:
A multitude of beings share a wretched existence
irrevocably bound together in perpetual torture.

lines.name: Annihilation's Approach

explicitModifiers.text: Take 10000 Fire Damage per Second while Flame-Touched
Gain Adrenaline when you become Flame-Touched
Lose Adrenaline when you cease to be Flame-Touched

lines.flavourText:
Pray that the flames find fascination,
for the true end follows when the great eye closes.

lines.name: Echoforge

explicitModifiers.text: (1-40)% increased Area of Effect for Attacks
(1-40)% reduced Area of Effect for Attacks
Deal no Physical or Elemental Damage

lines.flavourText: Witness the emergence of a new cosmic power.

lines.name: Dawnstrider

explicitModifiers.text: 100% increased Effect of Buffs your Ancestor Totems grant while Active
Buffs from Active Ancestor Totems Linger for 4 seconds
Maximum 1 Buff from an Active Ancestor Totem at a time

lines.flavourText:
In a void strewn with incandescent stardust,
the emissary of flame traverses interplanetary space
consuming the knowledge of fallen civilisations.

lines.name: Eternal Damnation

explicitModifiers.text: Gain additional Elemental Damage Reduction equal to half your Chaos Resistance

lines.flavourText: The price of immortality is isolation.

lines.name: El'Abin's Visage

explicitModifiers.text:
Has a Crucible Passive Skill Tree
Crucible Passive Skill Tree is removed if this Modifier is removed

lines.flavourText:
As the fiery remnants of our outpost were subsumed into the caldera,
a thunderous voice echoed across the barren landscape,
"Your fragility is your folly. May others rise where you have fallen."
- El'Abin, Bloodeater

lines.name: The Geomantic Gyre

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: (80-120)% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells

Has a Crucible Passive Skill Tree with only Support Passive Skills
Crucible Passive Skill Tree is removed if this Modifier is removed

lines.flavourText:
For their mortal allies, the last Titans forged a mighty staff,
one that could safely hold the first unearthed virtue gem.

lines.name: Ikiaho's Promise

explicitModifiers.text: Life Flasks used while on Low Life apply Recovery Instantly
Mana Flasks used while on Low Mana apply Recovery Instantly

lines.flavourText: Even the loneliest of souls can aid a friend in times of darkness.

lines.name: Kahuturoa's Certainty
lines.flavourText: Confidence is calm and measured.

lines.name: Kaom's Binding

explicitModifiers.text: Take no Burning Damage if you've stopped taking Burning Damage Recently
Nearby Enemies Convert 25% of their Physical Damage to Fire

lines.flavourText:
For centuries, he burned in an unending
nightmare of lava and flame... but he endured.

lines.name: Kingsguard

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 100 Life when you lose an Endurance Charge

lines.flavourText: The toughest armour is the trust of your people.

lines.name: The Nomad

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-30)% to all Elemental Resistances while you have at least 200 Strength
(40-60)% increased Projectile Attack Damage while you have at least 200 Dexterity

lines.flavourText:
Few men can guide their people
like the Great Meginord of the North

lines.name: Hrimburn

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (5-7) to (13-15) Cold Damage to Spells and Attacks
(25-100)% of Physical Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Reflects (10-100) Cold Damage to Melee Attackers

lines.flavourText:
Giant's blood you cannot tame,
as wild as an unwatched flame.

lines.name: The Searing Touch

implicitModifiers.text: +(12-18)% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +(40-60)% to Fire Damage over Time Multiplier
+2 to Level of all Fire Spell Skill Gems

lines.flavourText:
Burn to cinders, scar and maim,
Rule a world, bathed in flame.

lines.name: Replica Windripper

implicitModifiers.text: (20-24)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

explicitModifiers.text: Enemies Frozen by you take 20% increased Damage
+(90-120) Energy Shield gained on Killing a Shocked Enemy

lines.flavourText:
"Beware. Prototype #91 is haunted by a strange miasma,
an odour of evil. Nothing can shield the senses." 
- Researcher Arn

lines.name: Crystal Vault

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: 20% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Cold Damage
30% of Fire Damage from Hits taken as Cold Damage

lines.flavourText:
Beneath the frozen eye of Lunaris
a new world will be born.
A crystalline, perfectly still utopia.

lines.name: Trypanon

explicitModifiers.text: This Weapon's Critical Strike Chance is 100%
All Attacks with this Weapon are Critical Strikes

lines.flavourText:
"Though ingenious instruments have been found,
it seems surgery before thaumaturgy
was not so delicate."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 3546

lines.name: Saqawal's Nest

explicitModifiers.text: (12-20)% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency of Skills
100% increased Aspect of the Avian Buff Effect
Aspect of the Avian also grants Avian's Might and Avian's Flight to nearby Allies
+(120-150) to Evasion Rating and Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
The First of the Sky was the Last of the First.
It was he who showed us that our limits are self-imposed,
that what we take for law may just be an illusion.

lines.name: Replica Eternity Shroud

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Shade Form when Hit
Gain (3-5)% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage per Elder Item Equipped
Hits ignore Enemy Monster Chaos Resistance if all Equipped Items are Elder Items

lines.flavourText:
"The form of this replica came to me in a troubled dream.
I do not believe we should ever allow it to be used."
- Researcher Arn

lines.name: Esh's Visage

explicitModifiers.text: Chaos Damage does not bypass Energy Shield while not on Low Life or Low Mana
Chaos Damage taken does not bypass Energy Shield while not on Low Life
Chaos Damage does not bypass Energy Shield while not on Low Life
Reflect Shocks applied to you to all Nearby Enemies

lines.name: The Harvest

explicitModifiers.text: 1.2% of Damage Leeched as Life on Critical Strike
3% increased Global Critical Strike Chance per Level
Gain a Flask Charge when you deal a Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
Let it grow and gather inside them,
Let it flow through their veins.
Don't waste a drop.

lines.name: Slivertongue

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

Arrows that Pierce have 50% chance to inflict Bleeding
Arrows Pierce all Targets after Forking
Arrows Pierce all Targets after Chaining
Arrows that Pierce have +50% to Critical Strike Multiplier

lines.flavourText: A hundred blind heads, each seeking the taste of prey on the air.

lines.name: Ralakesh's Impatience

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Gain a Frenzy, Endurance, or Power Charge once per second while you are Stationary
Lose all Frenzy, Endurance, and Power Charges when you Move

Minimum Endurance Charges equal to Maximum while stationary
Minimum Frenzy Charges equal to Maximum while stationary
Minimum Power Charges equal to Maximum while stationary

lines.flavourText:
For the immortal, what is the difference
between an age and an instant?

lines.name: Honoured Alliance

explicitModifiers.text: 10% chance to Trigger Summon Spirit of Kahuturoa on Kill
10% chance to Trigger Summon Spirit of Utula on Kill
10% chance to Trigger Summon Spirit of Akoya on Kill
10% chance to Trigger Summon Spirit of Ahuana on Kill
10% chance to Trigger Summon Spirit of Ikiaho on Kill
10% chance to Trigger Summon Spirit of Rakiata on Kill

10% chance to Trigger Summon Spirit of Maata on Kill
10% chance to Trigger Summon Spirit of Tawhanuku on Kill
(10-15)% of Damage taken Recouped as Life

lines.flavourText:
The respect of Karui warriors is hard to earn,
but lasts a lifetime... and beyond.

lines.name: Silverbough

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: +(1-2) to Level of Socketed Bow Gems

lines.flavourText: The lone tree grows thickest.

lines.name: Bound Fate

explicitModifiers.text:
Every 5 seconds, gain one of the following for 5 seconds:
Your Hits are always Critical Strikes
Hits against you are always Critical Strikes
Attacks cannot Hit you
Attacks against you always Hit
Your Damage with Hits is Lucky
Damage of Hits against you is Lucky

lines.flavourText:
Knowing what will happen
and knowing when it will happen
are two very different things.

lines.name: Queen's Escape

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to maximum number of Raised Zombies

lines.flavourText:
The soldiers stormed her throne room.
The guards held them at bay.
The peasants overwhelmed the guards.
The nobles paid for their lives.
The nobles took her throne,
and so she fled to the woods.

lines.name: Infractem

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText:
Mark us with mercy, then press on with care,
Execute us steadily, notch away at our despair.

lines.name: Voidheart

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (1-14) to (3-28) Chaos Damage to Attacks
10% chance to Cause Monsters to Flee
Melee Attacks have (30-60)% chance to cause Bleeding
Melee Attacks have (20-45)% chance to Poison on Hit

lines.flavourText: Nothing spreads fear faster than the unknown.

lines.name: Bramblejack

explicitModifiers.text: Adds 2 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks
-(15-2) Physical Damage taken from Attack Hits
(40-1000)% of Melee Physical Damage taken reflected to Attacker

lines.flavourText: It is safer to be feared than to be loved.

lines.name: Marohi Erqi

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 15 Pulverise

lines.flavourText:
Lumbering as a sea lion, clumsy as a berry-drunk pigeon. That was Erqi. 
It mattered little. When Erqi's maul fell true, so did its target.

lines.name: Tawhanuku's Timing

explicitModifiers.text: (5-10)% chance to Freeze, Shock and Ignite

Spells cause you to gain Energy Shield equal to their Upfront
Cost every fifth time you Pay it

lines.flavourText: The soul still beats, even when the heart never did.

lines.name: The Effigon

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (12-14) to (24-28) Fire Damage to Attacks
Your Hits can't be Evaded by Blinded Enemies
Damage Penetrates (10-12)% Fire Resistance against Blinded Enemies

lines.flavourText:
By light we are shadowed,
in darkness we are bound.

lines.name: The Yielding Mortality

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are supported by Level 1 Chance to Bleed
Grants Summon Greater Harbinger of Brutality Skill
+5% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff
+(30-40)% to Damage over Time Multiplier for Bleeding from Critical Strikes

lines.name: Debeon's Dirge

explicitModifiers.text: 15% increased Movement Speed if you've used a Warcry Recently
150% increased Elemental Damage if you've used a Warcry Recently
Warcries Knock Back and Interrupt Enemies in a smaller Area
Warcries Knock Enemies Back in an Area

lines.flavourText:
A sharp and heavy beat,
discorded, out of tune,
when you hear it on the wind,
you know death will follow soon.

lines.name: Uzaza's Mountain
lines.flavourText:
The narrow path turned to rough rocks that led towards the sky.
One last obstacle in a life-long journey
to find a land they could call home.

<default>{This item can be combined with a Meadow and Valley ring at a Vendor.}

lines.name: The Cauteriser

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Strength Gems
Trigger Level 5 Gore Shockwave on Melee Hit if you have at least 150 Strength
Gain 70% of Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage

lines.flavourText: A burned branch leaks sap no more.

lines.name: Thief's Torment

explicitModifiers.text: +(20-64) Life gained for each Enemy hit by your Attacks
Gain (20-64) Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks
+(15-36) Mana gained for each Enemy hit by your Attacks
Gain (15-36) Mana per Enemy Hit with Attacks
(50-60)% reduced Effect of Curses on you

lines.flavourText:
The ring I stole,
My finger they took,
A shrouded mind,
Cut their curses short,
As I drained their spirit
And stole their soul.
A blessing is often a curse.

lines.name: Doomfletch

implicitModifiers.text: (6-24)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 100% of Weapon Physical Damage as Extra Damage of each Element
Gain (100-110)% of Weapon Physical Damage as Extra Damage of a random Element

lines.flavourText:
"Toasted or frozen
Or twitching in the light
I'm not fussy
And neither is Death."
- Koralus Doomfletch

lines.name: Putembo's Mountain
lines.flavourText:
He surveyed his lands, green and vital,
watched with pride as his slaves quarried fine stone for his fortress,
and thanked the heavens for his many blessings.
But this pilgrimage to the peak was to be his last.

<default>{This item can be combined with a Meadow and Valley ring at a Vendor.}

lines.name: Roth's Reach

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: (20-80)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText:
"Exiled to the sea; what a joke. 
I'm more free than I've ever been."
- Captain Weylam "Rot-tooth" Roth of the Black Crest

lines.name: Bloodbond

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Minions have (6-10)% chance to Dodge Attack Hits
Minions have +(6-15)% chance to Suppress Spell Damage

lines.flavourText: What mother wouldn't give her life for that of her children?

lines.name: The Surging Thoughts

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Summon Greater Harbinger of the Arcane Skill
Trigger Level 20 Storm Cascade when you Attack
Adds 1 to (60-70) Lightning Damage to Spells

lines.name: Timetwist

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText:
"Even for the great Magi,
time passes without relent."
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

lines.flavourText:
Upon the red pyre we are born.

lines.flavourText:
You shall be weighed and measured. You shall be judged...
and perhaps you shall be found worthy.

lines.flavourText:
Enraged by the incompetence of mortals
The demon-lord opens a gateway
Unleashing a litany of pain upon the world.

lines.flavourText: Imbue the body with stolen spirit, hold the leash tight.

lines.flavourText:
The greatest mistakes cause suffering 
long after they have been made

lines.name: Craiceann's Carapace

explicitModifiers.text: Grants Level 20 Aspect of the Crab Skill
Bleeding cannot be inflicted on you
+5 to Maximum number of Crab Barriers

lines.flavourText:
The First of the Deep was the First of All.
It was He who conquered the waves,
who stood guard as land rose from sea.

lines.flavourText:
"The newcomers warn of doom and death beyond mortal ken.
I ask, why should we fear the fire when we serve the Lord of Light?"
- Maxarius, the first High Templar

lines.flavourText:
A single moment sets in motion an eternal fall,
beneath which all are buried.

lines.name: Shaper's Touch

explicitModifiers.text: 2% increased Melee Physical Damage per 10 Dexterity

lines.flavourText:
By my hand, the inert is given life.
By my hand, that which rots is reborn.
There is nothing that cannot be changed.
Nothing.

lines.name: The Hour of Divinity

explicitModifiers.text: Duplicates up to 2 random Offer Rewards upon defeating the Herald of the Scourge
This item is destroyed when applied to a Sanctum

lines.flavourText: "They ascended together, one unwillingly. The vilified became black as coal, and the lauded, golden. After a lifetime of ambition, he finally had his heart's desire. It only cost him his brother." - Lycia, the Heretic

lines.name: Ashrend

lines.flavourText: The blasted oak stands forever.

Flesh may freeze and rot,
but the soul remains unbroken.

"The wild takes care of its own."
- Hyrri of the Karui

lines.flavourText:
"Are we mad for attempting to build an engine out of this?
Looping cycles, power and pain..." 
- Researcher Arn

lines.flavourText:
One by one, Kaom slaughtered the weakest tribe
leaders until the others leapt to join his cause.

Use the dead to stave off death,
An armour of bones and rot.
Hanging on with bated breath,
One lapse and all for naught.

Bargg Wurmkin once severed the heads 
of seven men in a single cleave.

An open mouth, a blinding shriek,
Your mind goes dark, your body weak.

Shavronne's apparel became ever more extravagant
as her body and soul became ever more corrupted.

lines.flavourText:
Greatest is the Brine King's domain,
and every day it grows a little greater,
not through force, but patience.

lines.flavourText:
"Better... stronger... more vital... and then... failure. Always, failure.
What key fundamental secret are we missing?"

- Rigwald, at the Battle of Glarryn

lines.flavourText:
The Oriathans built their empire on naval mobility, which allowed
them to wage war wherever their enemy was weakest.

lines.name: Death's Opus

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

lines.flavourText:
The overture stretches thin,
The chorus gathers to begin.
Stacatto, drone, a rest drawn long,
Another hears Death's final song.

War is a thriving infection.
It numbs the heart and eats away at the soul
until only emptiness remains.

and improved ability to micromanage us, I'm not so sure."

When the throat roars,
As eyes weep,
When the hand grips hard
With trembling fingers,
When belly twists
Yet legs stand strong,
That is the work
Of the Defiant Heart.

Chaos Damage does not bypass Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
Give me neither havens nor solace;
They are for the weak and frightened.
Instead, light the path to greatness,
So that I may begin my bright pursuit.

lines.name: The Gull

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 1 Create Lesser Shrine when you Kill an Enemy
Gain (10-15) Energy Shield per Enemy Killed
75% increased Effect of Shrine Buffs on you
50% increased Duration of Shrine Effects on you

lines.flavourText:
"It is the Gull that delivers Man unto Ancestor.
The consumer of our flesh. The seeder of our
souls unto the earth. We give the Gull his life.
The Gull gives us our Way."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

lines.name: The Retch

explicitModifiers.text: (0.4-0.48)% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
30% reduced Flask Charges gained during any Flask Effect

15% increased Movement Speed during any Flask Effect

lines.flavourText:
But the grain grew twisted and the water turned dark
and those who partook of Mother Gull's gift
birthed monsters that fed 
on the flesh of one another.

lines.name: The Vertex

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems have 50% reduced Mana Cost

lines.flavourText:
"A queen should be seen, admired, but never touched."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

lines.name: Thunderfist

lines.flavourText:
The roar of the heavens
Strikes more than fear
Into the hearts of Man

lines.flavourText:
"The gems are strangely human at times.
They simply love to be held."
- Doryani, First Seer to the Queen

lines.flavourText:
"Painful suicide in the hands of a fool, 
Creative death in the hands of a master."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 2992

lines.name: Windscream

explicitModifiers.text: You can apply an additional Curse

lines.flavourText:
The mocking wind, a shielding spell,
The haunting screams, a maddening hell.

lines.flavourText:
"A master artist takes his time when he's painting.
Unfortunately, my kind doesn't often have that luxury."
- Coralito, Brotherhood of Silence

Eternal soldiers fight for glory or death.
The Solaris Vanguard know only glory.

lines.flavourText:
Their last thoughts were not of their friends,
or their families, or their homes.
Their last thoughts were untethered from reality,
and bathed in fear and ferocity.

When the rains come, we cower beneath shelter.
The First of the Deep teaches us
that we should seek no shelter but ourselves.

When the inferno spread across the land,
it was the First of the Sky who singed his feathers
as he brought the flames to a standstill.

lines.flavourText:
A hungry beast wastes no energy. 
Every strike, no matter how small, must work towards victory.
The First of the Plains teaches us 
that the largest prey can still be whittled away.

lines.flavourText:
Only a fool seeks meaning
in a life so fleeting.

lines.flavourText:
It was a great honour to fight at the front. 
The few that survived the initial charge were guaranteed fame and fortune.

lines.flavourText: "So close, yet frustratingly distinct. Something more is going on here..."

"Prototype #722 might look like a helmet, but I believe it to be something else
entirely. The visions it shows the wearer... are beyond mortal endurance..."

The single well-placed arrow that changes the world
must be preceded by ten thousand practice shots.

The burden falls heaviest not on those that died,
but on those that did not.

A cacophony of battle cries
Reverberate through time and space
Inflicting pain beyond measure

lines.flavourText:
Bold and beautiful, a castaway
Hemmed and hawed, for her to stay
Oh, what I'd give for one more day
For she's the one that got away
-Franklin

Beidat made false promises to many denizens,
converting only one into a conduit through
which Wraeclast might be consumed.

lines.flavourText: "Building on the fear and hatred that deified him, Innocence threatened an eternity of flames for nonbelievers. The newcomers wailed and threw themselves at his feet in the thousands." - Lycia, the Heretic

lines.flavourText: "The mysterious traveller saw the vilified brother chained to a cliff, where all could point and shout and deride him. In one fell swing, she cracked the mountainside, freeing him." - Lycia, the Heretic

lines.flavourText: "In pursuit of divinity, he tried many times to found a religion. Few followed his initial symbols and proverbs. He needed something greater. A symbol none could deny." - Lycia, the Heretic

lines.flavourText: "After weeks of being pursued, the veiled traveller made her stand in a sandstorm. Somehow, she wounded a god. Innocence relented; his brother and the traveller made good their escape." - Lycia, the Heretic

They hoped that, trapped in its prison,
the creature would age and perish.
But time would not touch the fiend.

lines.flavourText:
The soldiers stormed her throne room.
The guards held them at bay.
The peasants overwhelmed the guards.
The nobles paid for their lives.
The nobles took her throne,
and so she fled to the woods.

As the warm ones choke and fall
Upon the frozen wasteland.

lines.flavourText: The secret of the elements lies within a square triangle.

lines.name: Venopuncture

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: Attacks have (25-30)% chance to cause Bleeding
You are Chilled while you are Bleeding
Non-Chilled Enemies you inflict Bleeding on are Chilled
Bleeding Enemies you Kill with Hits Shatter

lines.flavourText:
There is a way to survive the bite of an ice snake,
but few have the resolve to attempt it.

lines.name: Icefang Orbit

implicitModifiers.text: Adds 1 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: You are Chilled when you are Poisoned

Poisoned Enemies you Kill with Hits Shatter

lines.flavourText:
Those members of the Brotherhood who employ the venom of 
Trarthan ice snakes must take great care with the volatile substance.

lines.name: The Black Cane

explicitModifiers.text: Each Summoned Phantasm grants you Phantasmal Might

lines.flavourText: Lead the army of the damned from the front.

explicitModifiers.text: Critical Strikes do not inherently inflict non-Damaging Ailments
Critical Strikes do not inherently apply non-Damaging Ailments
Inflict non-Damaging Ailments as though dealing (100-200)% more Damage

lines.flavourText: Lay bare paths to pain you never knew you had.

lines.name: Willowgift

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

(15-30)% increased Attack and Cast Speed while at maximum Fortification

lines.flavourText: The storm cannot break that which bends.

lines.flavourText: An eye for an eye.

(25-30)% increased Attack Speed if you've changed Stance Recently

lines.flavourText:
Under its influence, shards of metal take on a life of their own, wriggling into flesh,
burrowing into organs, and exploding outwards in search of other victims.

lines.name: Wings of Entropy

lines.flavourText: Fire and Anarchy are the most reliable agents of change.

lines.flavourText: Teach a man to burn, and you'll be warm for the rest of his life.

lines.name: The Ephemeral Bond

lines.flavourText:
For how little time they had together,
their love was all the more powerful.

Total Recovery per second from Life Leech is Doubled

lines.flavourText: Somebody does have to get hurt.

explicitModifiers.text: Life Flasks gain 1 Charge every 3 seconds
100% of Life Recovery from Flasks is applied to nearby Allies instead of You

lines.flavourText:
"This will help with the pain.
One for you... and one for me."
- Doctor 'Shaky Hands' Opden

explicitModifiers.text: +5% Chance to Block Spell Damage per Power Charge

lines.flavourText: Obtaining information depends upon pretending one already has it.

lines.flavourText:
Never let the audience know your true form. Misdirect them,

explicitModifiers.text: Cannot be Chilled or Frozen if you have used a Fire Skill Recently

Hrimnor's presence was as cold as ice,
but his heart burned for vengeance.

Molten feathers, veiled spark,
Hissing arrows from the dark.

lines.name: Saemus' Gift
lines.flavourText:
Beaten in contest, he would try once more
Guided by magic, Magjar took aim at a dove
Saemus' gift would influence the score
Guided by darkness, Magjar spilled the blood of his love

lines.flavourText:
Mist of breath
Icing to lips and throat
As the warm ones choke and fall
Upon the frozen wasteland.

lines.name: Rearguard

implicitModifiers.text: Adds (7-9) to (13-16) Physical Damage to Attacks

lines.flavourText:
"It's a rare man that has eyes in the back of his head."
- Kiravi, Vaal Archer

lines.flavourText:
Fear not the dark, the song of night,
Hear not the arch, the falling cry.
My giving sun, fight no more,
Rest alone, my grand nightfall.

lines.name: Thrillsteel
lines.flavourText:
We may fight, and we may die, but in these
moments of blood and battle, we truly live.

lines.name: Elevore

lines.flavourText:
Ancient worshippers of the Greatwolf were overtaken
by a ravenous hunger for all things mystical.

lines.name: Briskwrap
lines.flavourText:
"I carry neither food nor drink. I rely on the charity
of my fellow wayfarers. Dead men are generous men."
- Taruk of the Wildmen

30% reduced Spell Damage taken from Blinded Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Those who are skilled in combat do not become angered.
Those who are skilled at winning do not become afraid. 
Thus the wise win before they fight, 
while the ignorant fight to win.

lines.name: Ashcaller

lines.flavourText:
"We do not command fire.
Ngamahu lends it, and Hinekora returns it."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

lines.flavourText:
"A man confronted with sufficient adversity
may ascend to unprecedented heights
and triumph over his coddled rivals."
- Weylan the Ezomyte

lines.flavourText:
The inferno surged past, devastating Stridevolf, but the Maraketh
warrior somehow remained. Soot-blackened and resolute, she
grinned. In that moment, the bandit king knew true despair.

lines.name: Stormseeker

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

(60-100)% increased Effect of Shocks you inflict while Leeching Energy Shield

Unaffected by Shock while Leeching Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
The fundamental forces of our world are secrets
to be uncovered by the intelligent and the capable.
Like all secrets, they, too, can be stolen.

explicitModifiers.text: (25-35)% chance to gain a Power Charge on Kill

lines.flavourText:
You can never truly tame the tempest.
You can barely even leash it.

lines.name: Bloodsoaked Medallion

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text:
Every 10 seconds:
Gain 2% of Life per Enemy Hit with Attacks for 5 seconds
Gain 5% of Life per Enemy Killed for 5 seconds

lines.flavourText:
"Atziri ordained that we exploit the weaknesses inherent in our slaves.
With relish, we did exactly as she instructed."
- Guatelitzi, Architect of Flesh

lines.name: Ceinture of Benevolence

explicitModifiers.text: Flasks you Use apply to Linked Targets

lines.flavourText:
"Put your faith in me.
Our god demands it."
- High Templar Maxarius

lines.flavourText:
"Slay my twin and I will inherit her wisdom.
Slay me and her life will be prolonged by my demise.
Our souls are eternally bound by the sacrifices we have made."
- High Priest Atazek

lines.name: Eclipse Solaris

explicitModifiers.text: (120-140)% increased Critical Strike Chance against Blinded Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Every decade, Lunaris devours Solaris
Each time, Solaris emerges from Lunaris, born anew.

lines.name: Piscator's Vigil

lines.flavourText:
"Stone still, amidst the reeds,
breath fogging in the iron cold air. 
he sits, he waits, he watches. 
A piscatorial vigil, sat by the river, 
his cathedral, his patience his unanswered prayer."
- Jojoba Mansell, bard, angler, adventurer

lines.name: Obliteration

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (30-40)% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage

lines.flavourText:
We forge order from the world around us
Wielding anarchy and destruction as our tools of genesis.

lines.name: Contract: Breaking the Unbreakable
lines.flavourText:
...the blueprints for my Extreme Warmth Beam, my Storm Wooing Rod,
the Mind Sublimator, and the Unbreakable...!

lines.name: Contract: The Slaver King
lines.flavourText:
"There can be no freedom
while hate still reigns."

lines.flavourText:
I suffer, I long, with thirst to slake.
